titleStmt.title: Regicidium Judaicum, or, A discourse about the Jewes crucifying Christ their king with an appendix, or supplement, upon the late murder of ovr blessed soveraigne Charles the first / delivered in a sermon at the Hague ... by Richard Watson ...
titleStmt.author: Watson, Richard, 1612-1685.

notesStmt.note: Appendix lacking in all copies available for photographing.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
